item.description:
After the Expo, join us for a drink!

We've been wanting to plan a fun evening social for a long time, so finally, here we go! We're holding it at the Rosebud Bar and Lounge, where there's a great full bar and plenty of space. It's one of Davis Square's hidden gems! It's right down the street from the Davis Square Starbucks where we usually meet. The bar has a separate entrance from the diner car. If you’re standing on the sidewalk in front of the diner, look to the right side of the diner; you’ll see a little pathway around back.

Let's fill it with ASL on a Saturday night! RSVP and please bring your friends!

Just to be clear, we are not providing drinks/dinner, just conversation and good cheer!
item.name: Evening ASL Social
